description: Try our easy to follow Mango, Yoghurt & Coconut Meringue Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Mango, Yoghurt & Coconut Meringue Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Dollop half the mango yoghurt evenly over meringue on one cake. Carefully top with second cake, meringue side up, and spread with remaining mango yoghurt. To serve, slice remaining mango and arrange on top of cake.
